title: My ranked winrate is over 50% but somehow my MMR has tanked and I can no longer climb...
body:
This is bullshit.

Last season when I was at 49% winrate I accepted my fate and knew that I would always gain less LP for wins and lose more for losses.  But this time I have   over 50% winrate and it's still happening.

This is garbage.  I know I'm going to get 15 for a win and 20 for a loss.  So I'm fucked even though my winrate is over 50%.

This auto tilts me now.

Sucks for the 4 other people on my team.  

Fix this, or don't.

I don't care anymore.

replies.body:
I'm in a similar situation, here's part of a post I made a while ago about my situation.

According to op.gg I currently have a 54% winrate, going by that alone I should be climbing and ranking up, even if slowly.

Almost every game I win I gain 17 LP, and almost every game I lose I lose 21 LP. I know because I see those numbers over and over again after every game.

Knowing this I decided to do some math. Lets say I have a 55% winrate over 100 games.
55 wins times 17 LP = + 935
45 loss times 21 LP = - 945

Even with a 55% winrate I would still lose more LP than I gained.

Lets say I have a 60% winrate over 100 games.
60 wins times 17 LP = + 1020
40 loss times 21 LP = - 840

Right now if I managed to get a 60% winrate I would only gain 180 LP over the course of 100 games.

Lets see what would happen if the amount of LP gained and lost per game was both 20 with my current winrate.
54 wins times 20 LP = + 1080
46 loss times 20 LP = - 920

If the amount of LP gained and lost was the same I would gain 160 LP over the course of 100 games.
That's almost as much as if I had a 60% winrate right now.

This post has some relevant math in regard to LP wins and losses
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/Fy2Krrx0-lp-gained-and-lost-makes-it-impossible-to-climb
